title: Killers Amongst Us: David Temple beloved coach, murderer? (part 3)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: David Temple beloved coach, murderer? (part 3)
description:
Belinda Lucas Temple is 8 months pregnant when she is murdered in her Katy, Texas, home. Prosecutors argued her husband wanted to get rid of her so he could marry his mistress, a teacher in the high school where he teaches. Does adultery however make a murderer?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
